item.description:
The response has been great so it's time to start golfing. Lets get together on Sat to hits some balls at a driving range then go golfing. I hope everyone can make it. We will meet At Rockledge in West Hartford at 1 pm. They Have a driving range. There are 2 courses we can play from there. Rockledge is a great course. Also up the road is Buena Vista a nice starter course. It is shorter and very laid back. Hopefully we have enough people so we play both courses.
Heres the schedule
1 pm Driving Range At Rockledge-West Hartford
2: 30 pm Golf at Rockledge or Buena Vista

It's going to be sunny and warm what a way to start the season. Even if you don't have clubs show up. Borrowing clubs is a great way to meet new friends.
See you there
Mark
item.name: It's a Golf Party !!
